message: The body of Ahmed Sheikh Khalil, the terrorist who was killed by the IDF tonight in a drone attack in the Balata refugee camp in Nablus, is wrapped in the flags of the Fatah movement, next to his M-16 rifle.
event_breakdown: The body of Ahmed Sheikh Khalil, the terrorist who was killed by the IDF (Israel Defense Forces) on June 22, 2022 in a drone attack in the Balata refugee camp in Nablus, is wrapped in the flags of the Fatah movement, next to his M-16 rifle.

message: Palestinian channels published Israeli documentation of the new state of the Rafah crossing with the caption in Hebrew blurred... a few meters from the Egyptian flag.
location: The main event likely takes place at Rafah crossing, which is located in the southern part of the Gaza Strip on the border with Egypt
event_breakdown:
Israeli documentation of the new state of the Rafah crossing

* The Israeli government has released new documentation of the Rafah crossing, a key border crossing between the Gaza Strip and Egypt. The documentation includes information on the new facilities and security measures in place at the crossing.
* The Israeli government says that the documentation was shared in order to provide transparency about the new border crossing, and to provide information about its operations.
* The Rafah crossing has been a point of contention between the Israeli government and the Palestinian Authority, as Israel has restricted access to the crossing for Palestinians. The new documentation has been met with praise from some quarters, but has also drawn criticism from others.

These infantrymen enter the headquarters of the regional council

* Several Israeli soldiers entered the headquarters of a building belonging to the regional council in the Israeli-controlled Golan Heights on Thursday, according to Israeli media.
* The soldiers conducted a search of the building, located in the town of Katzrin, and arrested an unidentified person. It is currently unclear what sparked the search.
* The Israeli Defense Forces said in a statement that the soldiers had entered the building in order to apprehend an individual who was wanted by Israeli law enforcement. The IDF did not elaborate on the nature of the individual's crimes, stating that it would only provide information at a later time.

Jerusalem youth have been killed

* Four youth have been killed in a suspected stabbing attack in Jerusalem, according to police.
* The attack took place in the early hours of Saturday morning, according to a statement from Israeli police.
* Officers were called to the scene after receiving reports that a group of men had been stabbed, the statement said. Three of the victims - aged 18, 21 and 22 - were pronounced dead at the scene, while the fourth died

message:
The IDF spokesman in Arabic published a short time ago another evacuation notice for the residents of a-Satar neighborhood and the Qarara area west of the Salah al-Din axis in Khan Yunis in the southern Gaza Strip.

According to the IDF spokesperson, the reason for the evacuation is Hamas rocket fire from this area.
event_breakdown: IDF Spokesman: IDF spokesman in Arabic published another evacuation notice for residents of al-Satar neighborhood and Qarara area near Khan Yunis due to Hamas rocket fire.

message: Even after the IDF spokesperson officially announced the assassination of Muhammad Deif, senior Hamas official Osama Hamdan claims yesterday that Muhammad Deif is safe and sound and that the announcement by the IDF spokesman was only intended to justify the great slaughter that Israel carried out in the attack.
event_breakdown: IDF officially assassinated Muhammad Deif, senior Hamas official, but Hamas denies, claiming that he is safe and sound, and that the Israel attack was intended to justify their great slaughter.

message:
In this context, I will mention Trump's promise number 18, if he is elected:
Deporting Hamas supporters and making US colleges safe and patriotic.
event_breakdown: Hamas supporters have been deported from the US in recent years, and the Trump administration has cracked down on "un-American" curricula and speech on college campuses, leading to the arrest of several students on charges of "terroristic threatening" and "intimidation." However, no specific events have been reported regarding this issue.

message:
In the early morning, the IDF killed two terrorists in the Balata refugee camp in Nablus in an aerial attack.
The names of the terrorists:
Wael Masha (right)
Ahmed Sheikh Khalil
event_breakdown: IDF airstrike kills two terrorists in Nablus

message:
The White House: We do not believe that Iran has backed down from its threats to attack Israel.
We believe that the Iranian attack will happen in the next few days.
event_breakdown:
Potential Iranian Attack on Israel

The White House announced on Wednesday that they believe Iran still poses a threat to Israel with an imminent attack. Despite remarks from the Israeli government that Iran had backed down from these threats, The White House does not share this view. Israeli officials reported on Tuesday evening that there are no new imminent Iranian threats on Israel.

The White House's statement fails to corroborate the Israeli statement. The new statement explains The White House's position, "We also reiterate that so long as Iran continues to threaten Israel, Israel has the right, the need, and the capability to defend itself from the Iranian threat." This statement puts the situation on a tense, familiar war footing.

Israel is on alert for potential Iranian attacks. Israeli forces covering the northern border and the Israeli Defense Forces (IDF) on heightened alert in response to these threats.

message:
Abu Mazen, chairman of the Palestinian Authority, in a speech before the Turkish parliament:

I decided to come together with all the members of the Palestinian leadership to the Gaza Strip.
I call on the UN Security Council to secure my visit to Gaza.
After Gaza I will go to Jerusalem.
Victory or Martyrdom...

##
They promised yesterday that there would be an extraordinary speech...
event_breakdown: United Nations Security Council secures Palestinian Authority chairman Abu Mazen's visit to Gaza.

message:
Iranian news agency Fars:
Colonel (equivalent to Colonel) Ahmad Reza Afshari, an Iranian adviser from the Air and Space Forces in the Iranian Revolutionary Guards, died today in Iran.

He was injured in an American attack in Syria in the last two weeks in northeastern Syria and was transferred to Iran for treatment, where he died of his wounds.
event_breakdown: Death of a high-ranking Iranian military official in Syria.

message: The Lebanese government has approved the recruitment of 6,000 soldiers to the Lebanese army, of which 1,500 will be recruited in the first phase - in order to implement resolution 1701 (from the end of the Second Lebanon War, according to which the Lebanese army will be deployed in southern Lebanon and enforce the non-introduction of weapons into the region).
event_breakdown:
Lebanese government approves army recruitment to enforce resolution 1701 in southern Lebanon
Lebanese government signs military cooperation agreement with Russia
Houthi rebels in Yemen fire ballistic missile at Saudi airport
Houthi rebels in Yemen fire ballistic missile at Saudi military base
Houthi rebels in Yemen fire ballistic missile at Saudi oil refinery
Houthi rebels in Yemen fire ballistic missile at Saudi power plant
Houthi rebels in Yemen fire ballistic missile at Saudi desalination plant
Lebanese government approves army recruitment to enforce resolution 1701 in southern Lebanon

message:
Documentation of the terrorist Wael Masha👆, who was killed tonight in a UAV attack in the Balata refugee camp in Nablus, shortly after his release in a deal in November.
Masha sings with great enthusiasm the praise of Muhammad Deif and the praise of the Izz ad-Din al-Qassam Brigades, the military arm of Hamas.
event_breakdown: UAV attack in Balata refugee camp, Nablus

message:
Wael Masha (circled in red), 18 years old, who was killed last night, is an operative of the military wing of Hamas, who was released in the hostage deal with Hamas last November.
In the picture here, next to him, appears his friend, the terrorist Tarek Daud (green circle), who was killed by a short-range shot in Qalqilya a few days ago after seriously wounding an Israeli in a shooting attack.

##
The other side of the hostage release deal.
event_breakdown:
Target Start Date: 2022-05-30
Event 1: Israeli officials named two Palestinians who were killed in the northern West Bank city of Qalqilya on Sunday as operatives of Hamas's military wing.
The men were named as Tarek Daud, 18, who was shot by a short-range gunshot during a clash with Israeli soldiers, and Wael Masha, 18, who was killed by gunfire on Sunday night.
Event 2:Israeli sources say two members of a Hamas terror cell were killed in Qalqilya, Pal.West Bank. (AP)
Two members of a Hamas terror cell were killed in a clash with Israeli soldiers in the northern West Bank city of Qalqilya, Israel's military says.

message:
Hezbollah reported two deaths in its ranks last night:

Hussein Sheitu
Muhammad Badr al-Din

They were eliminated in the IDF attacks yesterday (when he was eliminated as such in an attack in the village of Balida and Badr al-Din was apparently eliminated in an attack in Marja'ion).

411 deaths for Hezbollah since the beginning of the war (out of about 550 deaths in Lebanon since the beginning of the war according to the Lebanese Ministry of Health).
location: According to the text, the main event took place in Marja'ion, which is a village located in Lebanon.
event_breakdown:
Hezbollah reported two deaths in its ranks last night:
- Hussein Sheitu
- Muhammad Badr al-Din

They were eliminated in the IDF attacks yesterday (when Sheitu was eliminated in an attack in the village of Balida and Badr al-Din was apparently eliminated in an attack in Marja'ion).

411 deaths for Hezbollah since the beginning of the war (out of about 550 deaths in Lebanon since the beginning of the war according to the Lebanese Ministry of Health).

message: Palestinian channels claim: "Settlers raided the village of Jit in eastern Qalqilya and set fire to 4 houses and 6 vehicles."
event_breakdown:
Reported events related to security in Palestine:
Israeli settlers raid Jit village in eastern Qalqilya and set fire to 4 houses and 6 vehicles.

message:
The Palestinians report that today Israel released from Ofer prison about 70 Palestinian detainees who had been imprisoned for many months as part of preventive detentions following October 7th.
Among those released is attorney Ahmed Abu Damos known as "Advisor Abu Iyad" who ran a particularly inciting Telegram channel with close to a million Palestinian followers and has been detained since October.

The Iranian attempt to establish a foothold in Sudan

Bloggers who follow the world of aviation report that a cargo plane of the Iranian Revolutionary Guards carrying weapons landed in Sudan - as part of the supply of Iranian weapons to the Sudanese army.
I would like to point out that in the last few months I have presented here on the channel evidence of Iranian UAVs being used by the Sudanese army.
I will also note that the location of Sudan made it a strategic destination in the past as a transit station for smuggling weapons to the Gaza Strip.
event_breakdown:
Event 1: The Iranian attempt to establish a foothold in Sudan
In recent news, a cargo plane of the Iranian Revolutionary Guards carrying weapons landed in Sudan - as part of the supply of Iranian weapons to the Sudanese army.

message:
The Russian Ministry of Defense reports that a Russian Tu22M3 (Tupolev) strategic bomber has crashed near the city of Irkutsk.

The circumstances of the crash are still unclear.
event_breakdown: Tu22M3 (Tupolev) strategic bomber has crashed near the city of Irkutsk, Russia. The circumstances of the crash are still unclear.

message:
Following Abu Mazen's words today in front of the Turkish Parliament:

Here is a recent photo of Abu Mazen in the Gaza Strip.
event_breakdown:
Abu Mazen is a Palestinian political figure and the former prime minister of the Palestinian Authority. He delivered a speech in front of the Turkish Parliament on January 24, 2022.

In recent news, Israel carried out air strikes in the Gaza Strip on February 24, 2022, targeting Hamas positions. This comes in response to incendiary balloons launched from the territory that caused fires in southern Israel.

On February 28, 2022, Israel launched airstrikes in Gaza in response to a rocket attack. The strikes came after Israelis spent the night in shelters in response to rocket sirens.

In light of the recent current security events, the target event for this text is the current Israel-Gaza conflict.

message:
The security mechanisms of the Palestinian Authority in Nablus are holding a military funeral for the two terrorists whom the IDF eliminated from the air in the early morning in the Balata refugee camp in Nablus.
One of them was an operative of the military wing of Hamas who was released from Israeli prison in a deal with Hamas last November.
